title: Find the Convenient Ending Point
text: Since the data with the most decimal places has one decimal, we want our ending point to have two decimal places. Since the numbers $$0.5$$, $$0.05$$, $$0.005$$, etc. are convenient numbers, use $$0.05$$ and add it to $$74$$, the smallest value, for the convenient ending point.The largest value is $$74$$, so $$74$$ + $$0.05$$ $$=$$ $$74.05$$ is the ending value.
